title: Dreaming with Stars
description: "Everything started with the artificial intelligence..."In a post-apocalyptic future, society is controlled by a new race of humans that has exiled ordinary people, forcing them to live in camps while awaiting the verdict of a Congress that will decide how they should be treated.Ann is a normal young woman, who tries to adapt to her new reality while looking for hope in half gray days. When, almost without intending to, she is entangled in a plot that could define the destiny of Humanity, she will have to fight with her fears not only to survive but to protect those who trust in her.A day full of unforeseen events will lead her to discover dark secrets and find love where she least expects it.
author: Leslie G.
